channel.title: Data Science Portfolio on Thomas Bordes
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science Portfolio on Thomas Bordes

item.title: 🚴‍♀️ Bike Counters Paris analysis
item.description: project_1_bike_count_prediction_example.png 🍃 Data Merging: Combine multiple external datasets (weather ☀️, accidents 🚧, etc.) to enhance our dataset. 🧠 Model Training: Train machine learning models using scikit-learn, XGBoost, and others to predict bike counts 🚴‍♂️. 📊 Prediction Visualization: Generate detailed visualizations 📈 for bike count predictions with folium. Link to GitHub Repository

item.title: 🔫 Automatic turret to protect my garden pond 🐠 from Heron 🦅 (IN PROGRESS)
item.description: 🦅 Heron Detection: Identify herons in real-time using YOLOv10 and automatically trigger a Nerf turret to protect the pond. 🧠 Model Fine-Tuning: Train and adapt YOLOv10 to distinguish herons from humans and pets, reducing false alarms. 🛠️ Hardware Setup: Utilize a Raspberry Pi, webcam, and motor controls to automate the turret’s movement and firing. Link to GitHub Repository

item.title: 🦅 Human-Heron Detector
item.description: Welcome to the Human-Heron Detector! 👋🦅🧍 This project is a real-time detection application that uses YOLOv8 and a Streamlit interface to identify humans and herons. It is designed to provide seamless live detection and image processing capabilities. Detect Humans and Herons: Uses YOLOv8 to detect both humans and herons. Streamlit App: Image Upload: Upload custom images or choose from a gallery of pre-recorded images for detection. Download Annotated Results: Save images with bounding boxes drawn around detected objects.

item.title: 🍸 Cocktails analysis
item.description: Analysis of cocktail ingredients, revealing patterns, and trends in cocktail recipes 🥂. ✨ Key Features 🍋 Ingredient Analysis: Uncovers the most common cocktail ingredients and their uses. 📈 Visualizations: Creates detailed plots to illustrate ingredient distribution. 🍹 Clustering: Groups cocktails based on ingredient similarity for insightful trends. Link to GitHub Repository

item.title: Contact
item.description: Follow me on these social media platforms. Platform URL LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/thomas--bordes/ GitHub: https://github.com/ThomasBrdes You can contact me on my mail Professional : thomas.bordes@hec.edu Personal : thomas.bordes02@orange.fr
